verses.verse: This is <S%H1697>what<s%> <S%H3470>Isaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H531>Amoz<s%> <S%H2372>saw<s%> concerning <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

It shall happen in the <S%H319>latter<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> that the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%> shall be <S%H3559>established<s%> on the <S%H7218>top<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> and shall be <S%H5375>raised<s%> above the <S%H1389>hills;<s%> and all <S%H1471>nations<s%> shall flow to <S%H5102>it.<s%>

<S%H7227>Many<s%> <S%H5971>peoples<s%> shall <S%H1980>go<s%> and <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H3212>"Come,<s%> <S%H5927>let<s%>'s go up to the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob;<s%> and he will <S%H3384>teach<s%> us of his <S%H1870>ways,<s%> and we will <S%H3212>walk<s%> in his <S%H734>paths.<s%>" For out of <S%H6726>Zion<s%> the <S%H8451>law<s%> shall go <S%H3318>forth,<s%> and the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> from <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

He will <S%H8199>judge<s%> between the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> and will <S%H3198>decide<s%> concerning <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H1471>peoples;<s%> and they shall <S%H3807>beat<s%> their <S%H2719>swords<s%> into <S%H855>plowshares,<s%> and their <S%H2595>spears<s%> into pruning <S%H4211>hooks.<s%> <S%H1471>Nation<s%> shall not lift <S%H5375>up<s%> <S%H2719>sword<s%> against <S%H1471>nation,<s%> neither shall they <S%H3925>learn<s%> war any <S%H4421>more.<s%>
<S%H1004>House<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> <S%H3212>come,<s%> and let us <S%H3212>walk<s%> in the <S%H216>light<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

For you have <S%H5203>forsaken<s%> your <S%H5971>people,<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> because they are <S%H4390>filled<s%> from the <S%H6924>east,<s%> with those who practice <S%H6049>divination<s%> like the <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> and they <S%H5606>clasp<s%> hands with the <S%H3206>children<s%> of <S%H5237>foreigners.<s%>

Their <S%H776>land<s%> is <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%> and <S%H2091>gold,<s%> neither is there any <S%H7097>end<s%> of their <S%H214>treasures.<s%> Their <S%H776>land<s%> also is <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H5483>horses,<s%> neither is there any <S%H7097>end<s%> of their <S%H4818>chariots.<s%>

Their <S%H776>land<s%> also is <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H457>idols.<s%> They <S%H7812>worship<s%> the <S%H4639>work<s%> of their own <S%H3027>hands,<s%> that which their own <S%H676>fingers<s%> have <S%H6213>made.<s%>
<S%H120>Man<s%> is brought <S%H7817>low,<s%> and <S%H120>mankind<s%> is <S%H8213>humbled;<s%> therefore <S%H5375>don't<s%> forgive them.

<S%H935>Enter<s%> into the <S%H6697>rock,<s%> and <S%H2934>hide<s%> in the <S%H6083>dust,<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H6343>terror<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and from the <S%H1926>glory<s%> of his <S%H1347>majesty.<s%>

The <S%H1365>lofty<s%> <S%H5869>looks<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%> will be brought <S%H8213>low,<s%> the <S%H7312>haughtiness<s%> of <S%H582>men<s%> will be bowed <S%H7817>down,<s%> and <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> alone will be <S%H7682>exalted<s%> in that <S%H3117>day.<s%>

For there will be a <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies<s%> for all that is <S%H1343>proud<s%> and <S%H1343>haughty,<s%> and for all that is lifted <S%H5375>up;<s%> and it shall be brought <S%H8213>low:<s%>
For all the <S%H730>cedars<s%> of <S%H3844>Lebanon,<s%> that are <S%H7311>high<s%> and lifted <S%H5375>up,<s%> for all the <S%H437>oaks<s%> of <S%H1316>Bashan,<s%>
For all the <S%H7311>high<s%> <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> for all the <S%H1389>hills<s%> that are lifted <S%H5375>up,<s%>
For every <S%H1364>lofty<s%> <S%H4026>tower,<s%> for every <S%H1219>fortified<s%> <S%H2346>wall,<s%>
For all the <S%H591>ships<s%> of <S%H8659>Tarshish,<s%> and for all <S%H2532>pleasant<s%> <S%H7914>imagery.<s%>

The <S%H1365>loftiness<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%> shall be bowed <S%H7817>down,<s%> and the <S%H7312>haughtiness<s%> of <S%H582>men<s%> shall be brought <S%H8213>low;<s%> and <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> alone shall be <S%H7682>exalted<s%> in that <S%H3117>day.<s%>
The <S%H457>idols<s%> shall <S%H3632>utterly<s%> pass <S%H2498>away.<s%>

Men shall <S%H935>go<s%> into the <S%H4631>caves<s%> of the <S%H6697>rocks,<s%> and into the <S%H4247>holes<s%> of the <S%H6083>earth,<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H6343>terror<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and from the <S%H1926>glory<s%> of his <S%H1347>majesty,<s%> when he <S%H6965>arises<s%> to shake the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H6206>mightily.<s%>

In that <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H120>men<s%> shall <S%H7993>cast<s%> away their <S%H457>idols<s%> of <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and their <S%H457>idols<s%> of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> which have been made for <S%H6213>themselves<s%> to <S%H7812>worship,<s%> to the <S%H2661>moles<s%> and to the <S%H5847>bats;<s%>

To <S%H935>go<s%> into the <S%H5585>caverns<s%> of the <S%H6697>rocks,<s%> and into the <S%H5366>clefts<s%> of the ragged <S%H5553>rocks,<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H6343>terror<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and from the <S%H1926>glory<s%> of his <S%H1347>majesty,<s%> when he <S%H6965>arises<s%> to shake the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H6206>mightily.<s%>
<S%H2308>Stop<s%> trusting in <S%H120>man,<s%> whose <S%H5397>breath<s%> is in his <S%H639>nostrils;<s%> for of what account is <S%H2803>he?<s%>
